meanings.definition: Installed or loaded on a device before it is sold or used.
meanings.sent1: The preinstalled software on my new phone was very helpful.
meanings.sent2: The laptop came with preinstalled programs for convenience.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a tech wizard with all the preinstalled apps on my tablet.
meanings.sent4: The preinstalled features made the device feel like it was tailor-made for me.
meanings.sent5: The preinstalled settings were like a gift waiting to be unwrapped.

meanings.definition: To install or load software or applications on a device before it is sold or used.
meanings.sent1: The company decided to preinstall the new software on all computers.
meanings.sent2: I preinstalled the game on my console to save time later.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he could preinstall a cooking app on his fridge.
meanings.sent4: She preinstalled the updates, ensuring smooth operation from the start.
meanings.sent5: Preinstalling the software felt like preparing a surprise for the users.
